response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, we understand it's worth $15,000. Considering our commitment to fair transactions and the exceptional quality of our product, I propose a price of $12,000 for this opportunity. This offer reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 12000}
